children.description: Content rendered inside the Card (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the Card

component.description: Sets the base component to render. defaults to div (Type: React.JSX.IntrinsicElements)

id.description: ID of the Card. Also passed back in the CardHeader onExpand callback.

isClickable.description: Flag indicating that the card is clickable and contains some action that triggers on click.

isClicked.description:
Flag indicating whether a card that is either only clickable or that is both clickable and selectable
is currently clicked and has clicked styling.

isCompact.description: Modifies the card to include compact styling. Should not be used with isLarge.

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating that a clickable or selectable card is disabled.

isExpanded.description: Flag indicating if a card is expanded. Modifies the card to be expandable.

isFullHeight.description: Cause component to consume the available height of its container

isLarge.description: Modifies the card to be large. Should not be used with isCompact.

isPlain.description: Modifies the card to include plain styling; this removes border and background

isSelectable.description: Flag indicating that the card is selectable.

isSelected.description:
Flag indicating whether a card that is either selectable only or both clickable and selectable is
currently selected and has selected styling.

ouiaId.description: Value to overwrite the randomly generated data-ouia-component-id. (Type: number | string)

ouiaSafe.description: Set the value of data-ouia-safe. Only set to true when the component is in a static state, i.e. no animations are occurring. At all other times, this value must be false.
